exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

ruleContent.content:
<js>
jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')

.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);

key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}

  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){

}else {

}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

  u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
  cookie.removeCookie(u);
	hm=java.get(u,{});	cs=decodeURIComponent(String(hm.header("Set-Cookie")).replace(/[eE]xpires[^;]+;|[pP]ath=\/;|,|httponly|\s/g,'').replace(/^;|;$/g,''));	token=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(hm.body()).select('input[name="_token"]').attr('value');
s=page>1?'&page='+page:'';	body="_token="+token+"&kw="+key+s;
	head={"cookie":cs}
	post={
		"method": "POST",
		"body":body,
		"headers":head
	}
u+"/search/,"+JSON.stringify(post)
</js>

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-aym.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic." var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html
